oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Derivation and interpretation of the MilkBot® lactation model in monitoring health of dairy cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ehrlich, J. L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lactation model
lactation-curve
derivation
model parameters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The MilkBot® model is a nonlinear lactation model that has been shown to perform well both in summarizing differences in lactation-curve shape and in projecting future milk production for individual lactations. An understanding of the derivation and assumptions behind the model aids in interpretation of model parameters, which constitute a concise language for summarizing the distribution of milk production within a lactation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2012; 267
